intro.text: Hi, I'm Alex. I build small web apps, experiment with new technologies, and enjoy working with TypeScript to create interactive user experiences. Welcome to my chat!

about.text: I have a passion for coding, design, and coffee. Over the years, I've worked on various projects that blend creativity with technology. Here's a bit more about my background and interests.

contact.text: If you'd like to get in touch, I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Here are some ways you can reach me.

projects.text: I've developed several web applications, ranging from productivity tools to creative experiments. Each project reflects my commitment to clean code and engaging design. Let me know if you'd like to see some examples!
